text: 나는 몸에서 멀어지면 마음에서 멀어진다고 생각해
translated: I think if you move away from the body, you move away from the mind

text: 그게 참 사람마다 다를 순 있지만 힘든건 사실이지
translated: It can be different for each person, but it's true that it's hard

text: 처음부터 장거리는 더 힘들 것 같아
translated: I think the long distance from the start will be harder
If you miss me every day, you get married like me
So, do you like seeing each other every day?
